name: Super Slime Hero
description:
They say strange things happen in the night… the truth of this city is, there lurks a spirit in the midst of the night which no one really knows what is…. It is the element of curiosity in everyone’s heart and mind!! The identity of this strange gooey creature is none other than… THE SLIME MAN!!! The air is a bit spooky so the people prefer staying inside their homes at this hour of the night!!
The slime man is not a bad man but because of his naughty personality and a little gooey and hesitant superpower, civilians are not particularly fond of him either!!
The slime man even though does a lot for the people while they spend a safe night!! The slime man fights evil and creepy gangsters of the town and any other creatures who are in a way trying to harm the people but again due to his funny personality, people are scared of him a little bit…!!
He acts around like it is a Halloween adventure everyday and makes it therefore a running game for whoever he chases and is around him… Gear up for his tricks and spooky attacks that he will show to everyone around him in such crazy games!!!
His special power is the slime ball that he possesses. He has the ability and knows how to make slime and aim at anyone he likes to have an evil laugh and fun to himself!! He plays around in the city scaring off the evil and bad gangsters and at times having his fun go with the civilians as well!!!
Your slime man will be in his special outfit running around town with his superpower hidden in his costume and in his hand!!! It is activated when he chases someone for his fun and adds up for destructive nightmare for the bad people in the city like the gangster, other evil characters and for the bad people of mafia!!
Once you are in the game setting, you will be there in the middle of the night and since it is dark people are already scared and not much going around in the streets, in fear of gangsters, you can keep a look out to completely get rid of the bad people around!!
Using on screen joystick controls, make the slime man run behind the provided people and with the costumes you show how to make slime!!! Make a slime ball and aim it at the target to get the mission cleared!!
The game also provides your crazy slime man with his mission target to complete. With a navigation map and a game completing target time in order to succeed to next mission the slime man must carefully perform the task!!
HOW TO PLAY GAME
• Start the game
• Select the slime man character
• Choose game play environment and scene
• Use navigation map to follow the target
• Reach the target and perform mission in the given time
• Use the joystick to move
• Use on screen control icons to perform attack
• Complete task and go to new mission/level

FEATURES OF THE GAME
• 3D simulation
• HD graphic
• Multiple characters
• How to make slime simulator
• Night time simulation
• Fun sound effects and animation
Play the game as the spooky slime man and claim your victory mark!!
